name: Carmi Dating Sim
description:
THIS IS A FAN GAME

I DO NOT OWN STEVEN UNIVERSE. JUST MY ORIGINAL CHARACTER THAT THIS GAME IS ABOUT

I made this game for a contest on Steven Universe Amino. I'm still learning how to code and make games. I apologize if I messed up. I honestly have no idea what I am doing.

Feel free to follow me on instagram, twitter, tumblr, DA. User is tigercookie102 on all of them.
